text:
Hi All!
Does anyone of you know if there is a good Forum integration with HubSpot CMS?
<@U22PKFRU5>?

Hi everyone.
I am new here and I would like to know what is advantage to use HubSpot Design manager to create whole website with HubSpot over creating website in preferred CMS (Drupal, Wordpress,..) with HubSpot API integration. Let me know if there is better channel to ask this question. Thank you.

Google recently announced major changes are coming to page ranking that factor in page experience, some of which the HubSpot CMS doesn't handle well. For example, since Google started showing *Core Web Vitals* in the Google Search Console, a very large number of our pages created with the CMS are rated as poor for *Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS)*. I suspect this is going to have a big impact on our SERPs once this change goes into effect.

Does HubSpot have developers that specifically monitor Google changes for SEO and are there plans to change the underlying CMS to deliver a better page experience for pages created with it and hosted by HubSpot?
Here's a few links for reference:
• <https://blog.chromium.org/2020/05/introducing-web-vitals-essential-metrics.html>
• <https://web.dev/vitals/>
• <https://www.theverge.com/2020/5/28/21272543/google-search-results-page-experience-load-time-contentfu-paint-layout-shift-top-stories-amp>
Is there a hard limit on the number of custom properties a contact can have?
do the new themes handle this better?
Not sure, haven't tried them yet
I'm anticipating having to fix a lot of GDPR cookie banners and lead flows to cut down on CLSs

Does anyone have any resources or guides about improving a bloated website for speed on mobile?   ie: Removing unused JS, Eliminating render-blocking resources, deferring off-screen images and removing unused css?

Hi there, we have a tutorial we’re working on, which currently is fairly high level but will continue to be improved to add detail where it’s needed.
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/tutorials/speed>
It covers a bit of those topics and HubSpot specific actions you can take as well.

Their API docs state that there is a limit of 1,000 custom properties for any given portal. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/create_property#:~:text=Currently%2C%20there%20is%20a%201%2C000,have%20in%20any%20given%20portal.&text=The%20HubSpot%20API%20key%20for,re%20making%20the%20call%20for>.

Hi Does anyone know how to customize the design of the social icons and make sure that it is aligned together with the header tab when the page is scrolled down? Kindly advise on this.
Current Problem: This page was built with HubSpot (Refer to Pic 1)
<https://blog.roseattractions.com/>

 
Expected Result: This page was built with wordpress (Refer to Pic 2)
<https://www.roseattractions.com/contact-us>
